project.name: Moodle attendance bot
project.desp: Marks attendance automatically according to time table or by selecting any subject.

project.name: Vehicle Tracking System
project.desp: Designed hardware which need to be installed in vehicle along with server which will process all the request of hardware and of user who want to track

project.name: Calculator
project.desp: Total 24 buttons and implemented on self-printed PCB, works in proteus too.

project.name: NodeMCU
project.desp: Designed a responsive webpage to control the lights in different ways, send message to display, touch-less button to see message, webpage brightness can be controlled physically by potentiometer.

project.name: Color Identifier
project.desp: This GUI program identifies the color of the pixel where mouse cursor is present.

project.name: Snake Game
project.desp: Classic snake game with new functionalities, graphics without graphics libraries.

project.name: Twitter bot
project.desp: Bot accepts the commands in the form of tweets, identifies through “keyword” and then performs taks specified, can be used to control home lights by using Raspberry Pi.

project.name: Self Aid
project.desp: This was a group project for HackDartmouth VIrtual aimed at identifying stress level and calm your mind accordingly and also calming content.

project.name: Important stuff
project.desp: The website made to post information about internships and other important stuff chronologically, kind to be used among friends.

project.name: Geocode-API
project.desp: Pins the places specified in file on a map after using Geocode API to get coordinates.

project.name: Robot game
project.desp: A GUI game made in python.

project.name: Worldcloud
project.desp: Generates an image by text, in which greater prominence is given to words that appear more frequently. Simple but intresting.
